extName.message: TabMagnet - Open Tabs Next to Current

extDesc.message: Opens new tabs next to the current tab, with configurable position.

optionRight.message: ⭐️ Open to the right of the current tab (Default)

optionLeft.message: Open to the left of the current tab

optionStart.message: Open at the far left of the window

optionEnd.message: Open at the far right of the window (Browser default)

statusSaved.description: Status message when options are saved

languageChanged.description: Status message when language is changed.

shortcutInfoText_defaultPlatform.message: Tip: Use Alt+Shift+2 to quickly open a new tab at the far right!
shortcutInfoText_defaultPlatform.description: Information text about the keyboard shortcut for default platforms (Windows/Linux).

shortcutInfoText_macPlatform.message: Tip: Use Option+Shift+2 to quickly open a new tab at the far right!
shortcutInfoText_macPlatform.description: Information text about the keyboard shortcut for macOS.

shortcutInfoText_customizePart1.description: Part of the text before the customize link.

customizeShortcutLinkText.description: Text for the link to customize shortcuts.

shortcutInfoText_customizePart2.description: Part of the text after the customize link (e.g., a period).
